original_title: Tarahumaras 2003, La fêlure du temps - Initiation - Gloria
overview: Third chapter of La fêlure du temps. "It's enough that Gloria tells you the first time: if you want to work that way, do it. The sueño is not taught: you yourself are going to think how to work the sueño"
title: Tarahumaras 2003, La fêlure du temps - Initiation - Gloria
